title: NFL Combine Preview/What to Watch in Indianapolis, Mock Draft Monday (Football 2/24)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by NFL draft experts Ryan Wilson and Chris Trapasso to preview the 2020 NFL Combine. The guys discuss what's different about this year's event (3:30), the importance of this week in Indianapolis for prospects and what drills truly matter. Next, Will, Ryan and Chris take a look at prospects that could erupt at the combine (19:00), who could run the fastest and more. Finally, a look at Ryan's latest mock draft (36:00) focusing on the latest with Tua Tagovailoa, Jordan Love's stock and who else could help/hurt themselves this week.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @WillBrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @ChrisTrapasso
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
